casebody.data:
No. 393,

Misc.

Bary et al. v. United States. Joseph Forer and David Rein for petitioners. Solicitor General Sobeloff, Assistant Attorney General Tompkins, Harold D. Koffsky and William S. Kenney for the United States.

Application for reduction of bail, referred to the entire Court by Mr. Justice Clark, denied. Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Tenth Circuit also denied.
